docs.snippet: A by-the-book dismissal for cause, or part of a White House smear campaign? We sort out the facts.

docs.snippet: Bad advice, shady deals and incompetence define the presidential son-in-law’s tenure at the White House.

docs.snippet: Behind a facade of strength, Putin leads a nation deep in economic rot, military overreach and failure to serve its citizens.
Mr. McCabe faces accusations that he was not forthcoming about F.B.I. media contacts. Attorney General Jeff Sessions is reviewing a recommendation that he be fired, just days before his retirement.

docs.snippet: The long-serving Russian leader, who is about to be re-elected for a six-year term, has become a model for the modern autocrat.
